The claim states that Muslims comprise 1: of the population, 0.5% of mass shooters, and 10% of doctors in the U.S.
The expert: s verdict confirms that Muslims do indeed make up 1% of the U.S. population, according to a report from the Pew Research Center in 2016.
However: there is no reliable data available to support the claim that 0.5% of mass shooters are Muslims or that 10% of doctors in the U.S. are Muslims.
